DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine possibility gait pattern change via visual feedback among patient stroke . Also , optimal visual feedback would choose study .
DOC.brief_title: Gait Control Stroke Patients Using Visual Feedback
DOC.criteria: Hemiplegic stroke patient > = 18 year old Functional Ambulation Category > =3 Cognitively intact enough follow study protocol Adults without gait problem Quadriplegic stroke patient Orthopedic problem affect gait Underlying neurological psychological disorder Spasticity contracture impede gait . Uncontrolled medical problem Pregnant .
